entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: N 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
